title: Serverless Application Acceleration
description: Serverless Application Acceleration is all about shifting your team's focus from infrastructure to creating business value and new ideas by using the power of serverless computing. Get ready for a lean, highly scalable, and cost-saving app model üöÄ

challenges.description: Join us on the Serverless Application Acceleration journey if you face any of these challenges:

list.title: Too Much Operations Work
list.description: Are your teams managing infrastructure instead of building features?

list.title: Wasted Costs
list.description: Are you spending too much money on infrastructure that is rarely used or not for production?

list.title: Slow Releases
list.description: Do long deployment cycles and complex infrastructure prevent your teams from quickly iterating and getting new features to market fast?

list.title: Scaling Problems
list.description: Are your existing apps struggling to handle sudden load spikes?

list.title: Unsure Where to Use Serverless
list.description: Are you not sure where and how to best use serverless tech without creating new problems like vendor lock-in, complex design, or "serverless sprawl"?

approach.description: We use an app-focused approach that blends strategic planning with hands-on engineering, ensuring serverless tech delivers real business results. We work side-by-side with your teams to create lasting change. Our journey has three focused steps:

list.title: Serverless Readiness Workshop
list.description: We check your existing apps and goals to find where Serverless makes sense and where it does not. We check the best balance between speed, cost, and complexity to define a practical path forward.

list.title: Serverless Engineering
list.description: Together, we build or modernize your apps using the right serverless services, adopting the design patterns they need. We reduce operations and maintenance work, automating every step of the way.

list.title: Team Training
list.description: We help your engineers adopt the serverless mindset with confidence. Through coaching and hands-on support, your teams master event-driven concepts, automation, and operational best practices to become faster, more efficient, and self-sufficient.

list.title: Serverless Apps
list.description: Scalable, strong, and cost-saving apps that almost remove infrastructure work and make operations simpler.

list.title: Serverless Engineers
list.description: Teams with a deep understanding of the serverless service landscape as well as design and automation best practices.

list.title: Serverless Business Case
list.description: A clear business case and strategy for serverless use, leading to a predictable, pay-per-use cost model that drives lean and efficient systems.

list.title: Serverless Speed
list.description: Smooth releases to production, letting your teams spend less time managing infrastructure and more time focusing on new ideas and delivering value to your customers.

title: SaaS Transformation
description: SaaS Transformation helps you grow your software into a scalable, secure, and profitable SaaS product. Together, we modernize your setup, delivery model, and organization to build a product business that thrives on automation, speed, and constant value delivery üîÄ

challenges.description: Join us on the SaaS Transformation journey if you face any of these challenges:

list.title: Custom Delivery for Each Customer
list.description: Are your apps installed at customer sites, with special maintenance times, stopping you from growing quickly?

list.title: Release Chaos
list.description: Do you need to support many customized releases, stopping you from delivering value all the time?

list.title: Unclear Pricing
list.description: Do you struggle to connect usage, cost, and value, making it hard to build a lasting SaaS business model?

list.title: Complex Operations
list.description: Are 24/7 uptime, monitoring, and DevOps practices hard to achieve when adopting a SaaS model with your current setup?

approach.description: We combine strategy, design, and hands-on engineering to guide you from per-customer software delivery to a modern SaaS business. Our journey has four focused steps:

list.title: SaaS Readiness Workshop
list.description: We look at your current product, setup, and organization to define what must change. Together, we create a clear plan and an MVP that aligns tech, operations, and business goals.

list.title: SaaS Engineering
list.description: We design and build a secure, multi-tenant, modern cloud solution using Infrastructure as Code, automated CI/CD pipelines, and best practices for scaling and compliance.

list.title: Pricing Setup
list.description: We connect tech metrics to business value by setting up your solution for cost tracking, helping you define profitable, usage-based pricing and billing models.

list.title: SaaS Operations Setup
list.description: We set up monitoring, SLOs, and on-call processes to make 24/7 operations work. Your teams adopt DevOps practices and gain full ownership of the running SaaS product.

list.title: Running SaaS Solution
list.description: A secure, scalable, and automated solution built for multi-tenancy, constant delivery, and fast iteration.

list.title: SaaS-Ready Teams
list.description: Engineers ready to deliver and run your SaaS on their own with DevOps best practices and modern workflows.

list.title: SaaS Business Model
list.description: Clear pricing and billing for lasting growth in a tough market.

list.title: Reliable SaaS Ops
list.description: Full monitoring, automation, and on-call readiness for consistent, high-quality customer experience.

title: Pragmatic AI Adoption
description: Pragmatic AI Adoption helps your teams use AI where it truly adds value ‚Äî increasing focus, speed, and quality without creating chaos or risk. Together, we reduce mental load, streamline workflows, and ensure AI is used safely and well across all skill levels ü§ñ

challenges.description: Join us on the Pragmatic AI Adoption journey if you face any of these challenges:

list.title: Unclear Use Cases
list.description: Would you like to "do something with AI" but are not sure about the best use cases and how it truly helps your engineers and business goals?

list.title: Bad Data
list.description: Is your data messy, siloed, or incomplete, making it hard to use for effective AI models?

list.title: Skill Gaps
list.description: Do your team members have different levels of excitement, knowledge, and experience about AI tools?

list.title: Security Risks
list.description: Are you worried about privacy, data leaks, or uncontrolled AI usage in your development work?

list.title: Change Resistance
list.description: Do you struggle to balance new ideas with keeping things stable, making sure new AI features don't break existing workflows?

approach.description: We use a practical, engineering-first approach that aligns AI use with your real-world workflows and limits. Our journey has four focused steps:

list.title: AI Strategy Workshop
list.description: We find clear goals and use cases where AI makes sense and check where it can help your engineering teams. We find AI solutions to real problems, not the other way around.

list.title: AI Tool Adoption
list.description: Together, we use the findings from the AI Workshop. We carefully bring in the right AI agents and tools while keeping your engineers on board, set clear expectations, safe usage patterns, and training across all skill levels.

list.title: Workflow Automation
list.description: Next, we look at the business processes within your teams. We find repetitive or manual tasks and design AI-driven workflows to automate them.

list.title: Internal Data Connection
list.description: Now, we can connect your internal data sources safely to your AI models. This unlocks their true power as they have context about your company and can answer questions about it using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).

list.title: Clear AI Use Cases
list.description: A set of clearly defined use cases where AI makes sense to be used. We find AI solutions to real problems, not the other way around.

list.title: AI-Empowered Engineers
list.description: Engineering teams that use AI and automation with confidence while keeping control, quality, and security.

list.title: Smart Workflows
list.description: Repetitive, low-value tasks are automated, freeing engineers to focus on new ideas and customer impact. This is possible through the use of RAG and internal data sources.

list.title: Safe AI Usage
list.description: Clear guardrails and rules ensuring privacy, compliance, and ethical use of AI tools.
